snippet.title: Bitter Silver - Official Trailer | Game Devs of Color Expo 2024
snippet.description: Meet bounty hunter Lucia Lopez, Zap Matters, and Hobbes and join this misfit crew in this trailer for Bitter Silver, an upcoming choose-your-own adventure, space western visual novel game. In Bitter Silver, play as a bounty hunter leading a team of bickering misfits as you track down targets with your words or your weapons in a reactive story where your choices matter. A Kickstarter campaign and a demo are available now for Bitter Silver.
